title: CCNA ICND2 Study Guide- Sybex [Epub & PDF]
description:
CCNA ICND2 Study Guide: Exam 200-101
Author: Todd Lammle
Published: September, 2013
Publisher: Sybex
ISBN: 9781118758137
Format: Retail PDF and Retail Epub
Reader Required: PDF- Adobe Reader, Adobe Digital Editions etc
Epub- Adobe Digital Editions, Calibre, MoonReader for Android
Conversion: easily convert epub to mobi (Kindle) using Calibre
Tested on the above readers with no problems.
The Sybex website (link in book) offers bonus content and study tools, please note that you need to register an email address (free) to access some of the bonus content. The author also offers a free website and forum to further develop your skills (link in book).
Please allow a couple of seconds for the seedboxes to engage and then it should be nice and quick.
Enjoy and good luck with your tests :D
___________________________________________________________________________

Let Todd Lammle prepare you to ace the CCNA ICND2 exam

If you already have your CCENT, the ICND2 exam is all you need to earn the CCNA certification. This new study guide from Cisco networking authority Todd Lammle covers 100 percent of the objectives for the exam. Topics include operating IP data networks, understanding switching and routing technologies, working with IPv4 and IPv6 addressing, and troubleshooting. A robust set of study tools, including a network simulator that can be used with the book's hands-on labs and practice exams, gives you added confidence as you prepare.

Written by leading Cisco expert Todd Lammle, this complete study guide covers all the exam objectives for the new ICND2 exam Cisco certification is the number one certification sought by networking professionals.
-Covers operating IP data networks, understanding switching and routing technologies, troubleshooting and network security, and working with IPv4 and IPv6 addressing
-Includes a companion test engine (after free registration with an email address. Link is supplied in book) with hundreds of sample questions, a preassessment test, practice exams, and over 100 electronic flashcards
Features a network simulator for use with the hands-on labs included in the book
